---
title: "Bomrang Wind app"
author: "Kevin Wang"
date: "07/03/2020"
output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(bomrang)
  library(tidyverse)
  library(shiny)
})
```


```{r}
melbourne_weather = get_current_weather("Melbourne")

melbourne_weather %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = local_date_time_full,
             y = wind_spd_kmh)) +
  geom_path() +
  labs(x = "Time", 
       y = "Wind (km/h)")
```
